## hpr0722 :: How I Upgraded My PC - Motherboard

 
In this episode, Claudio recaps episode 1 and covers the what, why, and how of his motherboard purchase.


AnandTech: https://www.anandtech.com/show/4025/holiday-2010-system-builders-guide


AnandTech: https://www.anandtech.com/show/3877/asrock-890fx-deluxe-full-review-and-an-investigation-of-thuban-performance-scaling


Phoronix: https://www.phoronix.com/scan.php?page=article&item=asrock_880_mobos#=1


Hardware Secrets: https://www.hardwaresecrets.com/article/ASRock-890FX-Deluxe4-Motherboard/1094/1
